author: Staff Reporter
text:
The mortal remains of Army jawan K. Vijayakumar, who died in an avalanche in the Siachen glaciers, is yet to reach his hometown. The body was found on Sunday about 12 feet beneath the snow.

Collector M. Karunakaran said Vijayakumar was a native of Keelaverasigamani village in Sankarankoil taluk of Tirunelveli district. His family residing at Vallaramapuram North of the village was in tears. Superintendent of Police V. Vikraman said communication about the arrival of the body is yet to be received.

Sources said it might take a couple of days for the body to reach the village.
title: Jawan’s body yet to reach hometown
